scripts.deploy:ledger: PRINCIPAL=$(dfx identity get-principal) && dfx deploy ledger --argument "(variant {Init = record {minting_account = record { owner = principal \"$PRINCIPAL\" };transfer_fee = 0;token_symbol = \"ckBTC\";token_name = \"Token ckBTC\";metadata = vec {};initial_balances = vec {record { record {owner = principal \"$PRINCIPAL\"}; 100_000_000_000 } };archive_options = record {num_blocks_to_archive = 10_000;trigger_threshold = 20_000;cycles_for_archive_creation = opt 4_000_000_000_000;controller_id = principal \"$PRINCIPAL\";};}})"
